document.full_text: diet coke overtook pepsi-cola in 2010 as the no. 2 soda in the united states behind coca-cola, marking the first time a diet soda has ever risen to such prominence.
document.title: diet coke deposes pepsi as no. 2 soda in u.s.
lines_and_colors: diet coke overtook pepsi-cola in 2010 as the no. 2 soda in the united states behind coca-cola, marking the first time a diet soda has ever risen to such prominence.
